text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen:
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz † <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden † <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> † <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":14,"explanation":"Corrections made:
1) Added a missing closing </BIBL> for the "Memoires de Rochester" entry to fix improper nesting (1 fix).
2) Unified tag name <PRICE> to <PRIZE> to match the rest (1 fix).
3) Replaced garbled/mis-encoded sequences with readable text:
   - 'gro\u221a\u00fc' -> 'groß' (1 fix)
   - several '8v\u221a\u2264' -> '8vo.' (5 fixes; one per occurrence)
   - 'Anf\u221a\u00a7ng' -> 'Anfang' (1 fix)
   - 'Gespr\u221a\u00a7ch' -> 'Gespräch' (1 fix)
   - 'W\u221a\u00barmen' -> 'Wärmen' (1 fix)
4) Replaced dagger-like markers '\u221a\u2020' with a dagger symbol '†' (3 fixes)

All other XML structure was preserved; whitespace/indentation was added for readability. Total fixes: 14."}

parsed.explanation:
Corrections made:
1) Added a missing closing </BIBL> for the "Memoires de Rochester" entry to fix improper nesting (1 fix).
2) Unified tag name <PRICE> to <PRIZE> to match the rest (1 fix).
3) Replaced garbled/mis-encoded sequences with readable text:
   - 'gro\u221a\u00fc' -> 'groß' (1 fix)
   - several '8v\u221a\u2264' -> '8vo.' (5 fixes; one per occurrence)
   - 'Anf\u221a\u00a7ng' -> 'Anfang' (1 fix)
   - 'Gespr\u221a\u00a7ch' -> 'Gespräch' (1 fix)
   - 'W\u221a\u00barmen' -> 'Wärmen' (1 fix)
4) Replaced dagger-like markers '\u221a\u2020' with a dagger symbol '†' (3 fixes)

All other XML structure was preserved; whitespace/indentation was added for readability. Total fixes: 14.
